Exploring nearby attractions like Sugarcreek, fondly known as 'little Switzerland,' and the historic Roscoe village added to the magic of our stay. Book this charming little escape! This small cabin is like new and decorated to feel like home. The open floor plan felt spacious for such a small footprint. A few things to keep in mind to make your stay super pleasant:
1. You are in the woods. On a river. You'll appreciate bug spray and a citronella candle or two for the front and back porch areas.
2. The well water has a sulfur smell. Bring a couple gallons of filtered water with you and you'll be fine.
3. When you leave the house and want to lock the door, push the big button on the door lock for a second or two and then pull the doorknob so the deadbolt can slide. It's the tiniest bit off.
Go book your stay already! And be sure to tell Barb hello.
